text: The New York City Ballet is obviously speaking to a whole new generation and bringing it the same wonder and beauty that it brought previous generations.
author: Robert Caro

text: Many a genius has been slow of growth. Oaks that flourish for a thousand years do not spring up into beauty like a reed.
author: George Henry Lewes

text: Every performance is different. That's the beauty of it.
author: Van Morrison

text: My daily beauty regimen is definitely always in the mornings, and at night, always washing my face with a basic cleanser. I also use a moisturizer with SPF to follow up.
author: Shay Mitchell

text: We all have to find beauty within us, as opposed to just our exterior.
author: Shay Mitchell
